info.senderName: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
info.description:
At 04:30 am, MetService weather radar detected severe thunderstorms near WAHAROA, WAITOA, NGARUA, SHAFTESBURY, MATAMATA and THE KAIMAI RANGES.
These severe thunderstorms are moving towards the southsoutheast, and are expected to lie near MATAMATA, WAHAROA, TIRAU, THE SOUTHERN KAIMAI RANGES, TE POI, OKOROIRE and HINUERA at 05:00 am and near MATAMATA, TIRAU, THE SOUTHERN KAIMAI RANGES, TE POI, OKOROIRE, HINUERA, PUTARURU and THE MAMAKU PLATEAU at 05:30 am.
These thunderstorms are expected to be accompanied by very heavy rain and frequent lightning.
Impact:
Very heavy rain can cause surface and/or flash flooding about streams, gullies and urban areas, and make driving conditions extremely hazardous.
Frequent lightning is dangerous to people and livestock, especially those exposed outdoors or on the water, and can cause power surges and damage to electrical equipment.

area.areaDesc: South Waikato,Matamata Piako,Western Bay of Plenty,Waipa,Rotorua
